hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that:The Messenger of Allah [SAW] put on a ring of gold and put its stone (Fass) toward his palm. Then the people started to wear rings, and the Messenger of Allah [SAW] discarded it and said: "I will never wear it again

chapter.ara-name: باب نَزْعِ الْخَاتَمِ عِنْدَ دُخُولِ الْخَلاَءِ
chapter.eng-name: Taking Off One's Ring When Entering Al-Khala' (The Area in Which One Relieves Oneself)
